title: Take cover
initialText:
You take cover as soon as you can.
You hide, without anyone noticing, having a feeling of security.
But then, as the ground shook, and the air filled with smoke and debris, it landed in front of you.
The beast, with bright red skin, looked directly at you, out of hiding.
Filled with fear, you decide to test if this was a dream or not: you gently closed your eyes, and hoped for the best.
And when you opened them...
